Common Questions

What's included in the price?

Each package includes design, development, and testing of your website. You'll also get help with setting up your domain and hosting if needed. The prices shown are one-time fees — there are no hidden charges. The only ongoing cost is hosting (typically €10-20/month) which you pay directly to the hosting provider.

How long does it take to build a website?

A simple Starter website typically takes 1-2 weeks. Business websites take 2-3 weeks, and e-commerce sites take 3-4 weeks. These timelines assume you can provide your content (text, images, logo) promptly. If you need us to create content for you, add an extra week.

Do I need to pay everything upfront?

No. I typically ask for 50% to start the project, with the remaining 50% due when your website is ready to launch. For larger projects, I can arrange a payment plan that works for you.

Can I update the website myself?

Yes! I build websites with user-friendly content management systems. You'll be able to update text, add new photos, create blog posts, and more — no coding required. I also provide a short training session to show you how everything works.

What if I need something not listed here?

Every business is different, and I'm happy to create a custom package for your specific needs. Whether you need a booking system, membership area, multilingual support, or something else entirely — just tell me what you're looking for and I'll provide a quote.

Do you work with businesses outside Limassol?

Absolutely! While I'm based in Limassol, I work with clients across Cyprus — Nicosia, Paphos, Larnaca, and beyond. Most of my communication can be done via email, phone, or video call. I'm also happy to meet in person if you prefer.

Not Sure Which Package You Need?

No problem! Send me a message describing your business and what you're looking for. I'll recommend the best option and provide a free, no-obligation quote.
